name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Wrath of the Darkhul King
name_original: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Wrath of the Darkhul King
description:
Into Each Generation A Slayer Is Born...

Help Buffy vanquish fierce vampires using cool fighting tactics and customizable slayer weaponry. Guide Buffy through Sunnydale as she battles the most fearsome creatures and rescues the innocent.
- Customizable Slayer Weapons
- Battle Fearsome Enemies
- Fully Interactive Environments
